fullText:
Manifest Resistance

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Genasi
Benefit: Increase the resist value provided by your elemental manifestation (if any) by 5. For example, when manifesting firesoul at 1st level to 10th level, you gain resist 10 fire (instead of resist 5 fire).

Published in Forgotten Realms Player's Guide, page(s) 135.
